title: Electrical Engineering Materials
Description: Electrical Engineering Materials Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) to practice Electrical Engineering Materials basic quiz answers

questions.question: Which of the following elements of electrical engineering cannot be analyzed using Ohmâ€™s law?
What is constant for a charged spherical shell according to basic electrical energy?

answers.Answer: Electrical potential outside the spherical shell
Electrical potential inside the spherical shell
Electrical field outside the spherical shell
Electrical field inside the spherical shell

questions.question: Where does electro-static shielding occur in a charged spherical shell?

answers.Answer: When electrical potential outside spherical shell is zero
When electrical potential inside the spherical shell is zero
When electrical field outside the spherical shell
Electrical field inside the spherical shell

questions.question: Which of the following is a correct representation of peak value in an AC Circuit?
Which of the following according to fundaments of electrical energy is correct about alternating current?

answers.Answer: Can be transported to larger distances with less loss in power
